contents: <sup>1</sup>Pizza: everyone loves it. <sup>2</sup>Everyone also has strong opinions about it, especially people in New York City and Chicago. <sup>3</sup>Chicago specializes in deep-dish pizza with a thick crust and tomato sauce poured on top of the cheese. <sup>4</sup>Over two inches thick, it’s baked in a “deep dish” skillet. <sup>5</sup>New York pizza is traditionally thin-crust. <sup>6</sup>You can watch the pizza-makers tossing the big circles of dough in the air and rolling them out until they’re less than half-an-inch thick. <sup>7</sup>New York pizzas are put on a thin metal tray, covered with sauce, topped with cheese, and slid into the oven.
